6905843_style_2: PROCEDURE: Rigid Bronchoscopy with Therapeutic Intervention. The patient presented with left mainstem obstruction. A 12mm rigid scope was inserted. The tumor was debulked using APC, cryotherapy, and mechanical forceps. A CRE balloon was used to dilate the airway, achieving improved patency. Additionally, EBUS-TBNA of a subcarinal mass was performed for diagnosis.
